content: a yarn tail and then bring both the beginning yarn tail and working tail through stitch to finish the slip_stitch to join - do not cut yarn yet 5 closing up the scrubby - after bringing both yarn tails through the final slip_stitch as described above tie a knot with both yarn tails and then using a yarn needle take one yarn tail and weave yarn tail back and forth through both sides of opening to close up the last round repeat with second yarn tail to ensure opening is fully closed ending next to where first yarn tail finished tie both tails together into another knot and ensure to pull tight with a yarn needle bring both yarn ends to the inside of the scrubby and through to the opposite side you were just working with tie yarn tails into a knot once more and then cut off remaining tails leaving just a bit of length to make sure knots do not become untied tuck yarn tail ends back into the inside of the scrubby to finish the scrubby can be machine washed and dried enjoy your double duty scrubby hashtag your finished scrubbies #doubledutyscrubby on instagram i d love to see your finished work please credit my shop in stitches - crochet by sl @inslstitches for the pattern with your finished projects please do not alter rewrite or attempt to resell this pattern as it is copyrighted thank you for your cooperation double duty dish scrubby 2 of 2 copyright © 2018 in stitches crochet by sl
